Posts.Content: I went to my Gp yesterday with a breast lump and now have to wait for my fast track appointment at the breast clinic . I have had the lump for 3 months and only told my husband the day before my Gp appointment. I spent that 3 months thinking I was imagining  the lump so expected the doctor to say nothing to worry about came as a shock to think she could feel it although said she thought it was smooth and mobile. What does this mean? I’m 59 years old and have bc in my family on my mothers side of the family ( aunt and grand mother)  I’m trying to put a brave face on at home as my husband is a real worrier and don’t want to cause him stress.
Posts.Title: New to the club

Posts.Content: Thanks Lesley, I have just had my appointment through, next Tuesday so not too long to wait .
Posts.Title: New to the club

Posts.Content: Thanks Helen, I have had my appointment come through for next Tuesday , so I feel lucky after reading how long you waited. Thanks so much for emailing me I really do appreciate it. I will update you as soon as I have any news . Thanks again
Posts.Title: New to the club

Posts.Content: Thanks s much for replying to my post. I have app for next Tuesday so not long to wait. Good luck for your mammogram on Friday . Xx
